doc.field: Includes various photos of HRL at the groundbreaking ceremony for the new TIME-LIFE building; Alan G. Langdon presenting HRL with a wallaby; HRL on the show Meet the Press; HRL at the IIDC conference; contact sheet with HRL portraits by Walter Daran; HRL shaking hands with David Sarnoff at the Palace of the Legion of Honor reception; HRL with Eric Johnston; photo autographed by Harry A. Bruno with HRL at the air service post of the American Legion; various photos from the American Friends of Vietnam dinner honoring Vietnamese President Ngo Dinh Diem which include HRL with Diem, Angier Biddle Duke, and others; Niloo Bhatt presenting a replica of a Ceylonese mask to HRL; HRL with John Diefenbaker; HRL with Allister Grosart; HRL with Francis Lacoste; and HRL with Goodwin Knight.
